```{r introduction, echo=FALSE, include=TRUE, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}

## load packages
library(nlme)
library(JMbayes)
    
## linear mixed effects model
lmeFit1 <- lme(CD4 ~ obstime + obstime:drug, data = aids,
    random = ~ 1 | patient)
summary(lmeFit1)



```
